channel.title: Java cannot be reconigzed as an internal or external command
channel.description:
When I try running my server it says 'Java' cannot be reconigzed as an internal or external command press any key to continue...
I have downloaded the latest version of Java.
Is there anything you could think of that I have not done so it will work?

item.title: Java cannot be reconigzed as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @0.o 0.o
item.description:
@0.o wrote:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;.
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_06\bin

Make sure to change it to your java versions.

Read full topic
item.source: Java cannot be reconigzed as an internal or external command

item.title: Java cannot be reconigzed as an internal or external command
item.dc:creator: @_Kevin1 ~Kevin
item.description:
@_Kevin1 wrote:

i would go and fine where your jdk is located and copy and paste the location
and then find where your ant is located and copy and paste that.

but i forget which one you copy and paste to which.

one goes to path and other goes to classpath.

Read full topic
item.source: Java cannot be reconigzed as an internal or external command
